title: Riele Downs
summary: Riele Downs (born July 8, 2001) is a Canadian actress. She began her career as a child actress, playing Faith in the 2013 film The Best Man Holiday. She went on to co-star as Charlotte on the Nickelodeon television series Henry Danger from 2014 to 2020. In 2022, she starred as Darby Harper in the Hulu film Darby and the Dead.
